body:
Hey guys!

Today's post is about my new thing i'm doing on every map on avicus. Since I created a mexican themed name, I'm creating a taqueria on every map. It will have:
  • a kitchen
  • chairs
  • scenic views of people killing each other
  • and occasional pvp-ing for entertainment
The price is free, and tips of golden Tortillas are appreciated.

So if you ever see me online, ask to see the taqueria!

-Senor

title: Taqueria! Woot Woot

replies.body:
XD Love the idea. 
Although you can broadcast this ingame or tell others through a social network, sadly thread is spam and doesn't encourage a discussion.  
Have a good day :D
